trans-unit.source: Set parameters for data shown throughout this section of the app.

seg-source.mrk: Set parameters for data shown throughout this section of the app.

target.mrk: 設定此應用程式區段所顯示資料的參數。

trans-unit.source: Data in this section is only shown for the time frame, plan category, and currency that you select here under <uicontrol>Set Parameters</uicontrol>. The default is for the current fiscal period, order standard cost, and company code currency.

seg-source.mrk: Data in this section is only shown for the time frame, plan category, and currency that you select here under <uicontrol>Set Parameters</uicontrol>.
The default is for the current fiscal period, order standard cost, and company code currency.

target.mrk: 此區段所顯示的資料僅針對您在 <uicontrol>[設定參數]</uicontrol> 內所選的期間、計劃種類和幣別。
預設是目前會計期間、訂單標準成本和公司代碼幣別。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <uicontrol>Order Balance</uicontrol> shown on the opening screen of the app represents the total actual costs over the lifetime of the order so far, whereas the <uicontrol>Actl Cost.</uicontrol> value here is only for the time frame selected under <uicontrol>Set Parameters</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: Note that the <uicontrol>Order Balance</uicontrol> shown on the opening screen of the app represents the total actual costs over the lifetime of the order so far, whereas the <uicontrol>Actl Cost.</uicontrol> value here is only for the time frame selected under <uicontrol>Set Parameters</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 請注意，在應用程式開啟畫面所顯示的 <uicontrol>[訂單餘額]</uicontrol> 會表示訂單從開始至今的總計實際成本，而此處 <uicontrol>[實際成本]</uicontrol> 值只表示在 <uicontrol>[設定參數]</uicontrol> 內所選期間的實際成本。

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the parameters as required. For the <uicontrol>Fiscal Year Period</uicontrol> fields, enter a year and period in the format YYYYPPP. For example, for fiscal period 003 in year 2021, you would enter 2021003.

seg-source.mrk: You can adjust the parameters as required.
For the <uicontrol>Fiscal Year Period</uicontrol> fields, enter a year and period in the format YYYYPPP.
For example, for fiscal period 003 in year 2021, you would enter 2021003.

target.mrk: 在 <uicontrol>[會計年度期間]</uicontrol> 欄位，以格式 YYYYPPP 輸入年度和期間。

trans-unit.source: By selecting a different cost component structure, you change how the costs associated with the order are grouped under cost components. Only cost component structures that are flagged as Cost of Goods Manufactured will be available.

seg-source.mrk: By selecting a different cost component structure, you change how the costs associated with the order are grouped under cost components.
Only cost component structures that are flagged as Cost of Goods Manufactured will be available.

target.mrk: 藉由選擇不同的成本元件結構，您可更改訂單相關成本在成本元件內的分組方式。
只有加註製造成本旗標的成本元件結構可供使用。
